title: XTB Limited Secures the Services of Ex-City Index Veteran, Joshua Raymond
text:
XTB Limited Secures the Services of Ex-City Index Veteran, Joshua Raymond XTB Limited Secures the Services of Ex-City Index Veteran, Joshua Raymond Prior to landing at XTB, Mr. Raymond has been a mainstay at City Index in a number of senior level roles. Advertising Print This Post Photo: Bloomberg 
X-Trade Brokers (XTB) Limited has secured the services of Joshua Raymond as its newest Director, following a lengthy stint at City Index, according to a recent regulatory filing. 
In his new role at XTB, Mr. Raymond will be based out of the UK, a locale he’s well familiar with after a decade-long career at City Index – his appointment has been tendered with immediate effect. Prior to landing at XTB, Mr. Raymond has been a mainstay at City Index in a number of senior level roles. During this time he was mainly responsible for the group’s marketing strategy, digital capabilities, content, social media, education, PR, and communications. 
His tenure with the company also included, among others, positions as its Managing Director, Market Strategist, Head of UK Retail Sales, and Senior Account Manager, dating back to 2006 – additionally, he has also worked at IFX Markets (Finspreads) as a sales trader. 
Earlier this year, XTB made headlines following its consideration of a listing on the Warsaw Stock Exchange with an offering worth up to $224 million (€200 million) million). XTB was founded in Poland back in 2002 and is the parent group of XTB Limited, the British arm of its business that specializes in FX. Got a news tip? Let Us Know FOUND A MISTAKE
